name: AVCaptureDevice.AutoFocusRangeRestriction
desc: Constants to specify the autofocus range of a capture device.

items.name: case none
items.desc: The device attempts to focus on objects at any range.

items.name: case near
items.desc: The device primarily attempts to focus on subjects near the camera.

items.name: case far
items.desc: The device primarily attempts to focus on subjects far away from the camera.
